section.p: The market is large and busy. At the corner of Brimstone Plaza, gigantic braziers burn sweet-smelling incense in an attempt to overpower the rotten-egg smell that permeates the whole city. There are many stalls and goods to chose from. You may buy any of the items listed, as long as you have the money and the space to carry it. You may also sell any items you own that are listed below, for the price stated - if you do, don’t forget to cross them off your Adventure Sheet.
Items with no purchase price are not available locally.
